Blog.post: Ellew~ :) Met my sayang tadi..then went to yayasan wif her n her fwen..fizah. Pakai perahu tambang ke sana. It was fun! Hehe. My sayang held tight my hand on the way there.. :p Tadi pagi..went to dst gadong masa ps. Cari line easi for my sayang. Its been 1 week nda bemsg sama ia. So boring! So lonely! Usually..before tidur..ada my sayang wish me "gud nyt". When i woke up..she wish me "gud morning". I miss all that.. I MUST get her the easi line ASAP. Rindu kali ah.. Tonite..my sayang tidur d muara arah her nini. I wonder makan ka ia udah or nda.. I really really care bout her. She's my sayang, she's my life and she's my everything. Im willing to do anything just for her. ;) Lunch d mall tadi..i dun think i need to tell the name. Sama juanya..hehe. Sangal saja menaip dorang punya nama. History class nada tadi..mr mark ada appointment. Okey jua tu wa..i always feel sleepy in his class. :p Shukri sent me to sgs tadi..malas kan ikut my dad. Hehe. I wonder sapa kuar malam nie. I think..bob.. Hehe. Ntah ah. I just got the feeling that ia yang akan kuar. Oh yea..jazzy's going back to brunei next sunday! 8 months nda jumpa ia. He's one of my close fwen masa d st george..and one of the craziest person in our class. Haha. Jgn mare.. :p This monday..jumpa my sayang lagi. Can't wait. I wish i could be beside her 24/7. I wanna spend all of my time with her.. Btw..tommorow..1 month dah we've been together.. Nda kerasahan. Time just passed by quickly.. Maybe its becoz i really really really really really really enjoy being with her. Yep. :) I love u yang.. *hugs* *muahz* ;)

Its 8.30pm. Nada my sayang ada msg me today..busy ya kali..or her mum/dad nada cred. I would have call her if ia ada msg. But then..nada ada. Only call if ada msg from her. Thats what my sayang said. *sigh* Yang..me rindu wa..im sooo lonely. :( Hmmm..nothing much to write bout today. Woke up at 10.30am this morning..mandi..makan..sembahyang jumaat. Then..masa balik dari masjid..check my hp..no msg/mc. *phew* Nobody care/remember about me.. I slept the whole afternoon. My day's not so interesting or fun today. My auntie nada datang ke rumah. Sunyi verabis.. Love you sayang. ;) 30 days..

i feel so lonely ryt now. Usually around this time..ada ya msg me kai hp her mum/dad..askin me to call her at home. Hmmm i really really miss her. Sayang..me rindu rah u. I really miss ur voice.. A day is like a year if nda dangar suara u. I hardly can do anything. I kept on thinking of u.. Ive been waiting since tadi.. I'll just wait. I knew my sayang pun catu jua.. *hugs*

*Phew* Sakit my perut ryt now. Dunno y. Sal lapars kali..alum makans. Krg saja masak maggi.. Hmmm..i slept too much tadi d skulah. Masa class gp..masa d library..n geo. Hehe. Napa ya aku kalat mata berabis tadi atu kan? Hehe. Tadi ada geo test..phew...it was...entah. No comment. I dun think i can get gewd grade like before. *Sigh* Borings ih..my sayang haven't got her easi line. Alum dapat the number she wanted. She wants the number in the end ****529 (family no). I'll try to cari esok or maybe this saturday d dst. I'd do anything for my sayang. Hehe. Rindu kali ah mun nda bermsg.. My world mcm empty.. Tadi patang jumpa my sayang..as usual..d sas. No other place. Hehe. Yang..cute u ah mun pakai tudung. Cute verabis. Vanars.. ;) Oh yeah..i didnt blog last nite. Terlampau bz..n kalat mata. K la. Im gona stop now. Kan liat tv..cerita cina..n krg..susun my photo album. I love you! *muahz* 29 days.. ;)

Yipee..baru siap buat my history essay. Hehe. Nasib jua dah siap..due datenya esok. :) Met my sayang tadi d sas. *muahz* Siuk la.. I wish i can be with her all the time. Rindu wa~ I really really duno what to type anymore actually. Kalat mata dah. Tomorrow skool..my sis b'day. Alum ku belikan ia punya present. Esok saja la..belikan d yayasan after my dental appointment. 27 days.. Love you sayang. ;) *hugs*

So sleepy tadi pagi when i woke up. Slept late last nite. Doing my geo report.. *Phew* My essay lagi kena suruh re-do oleh my english literature tcher. Not enuf words katanya. Need some expansion. Ngalih kali ah menulis atu.. eeee~ Antam saja tia karang. Malas tah ku ingau.. Im so sick of writing essays! Called up my sayang tadi pagi..d skulah..pakai public phone. Hehe. Ramai jua la orang meliat. But then, i dun give a damn about it. Bukannya aku nyusahkan dorang. Nda ja..? Im using my phone card to call her..not theirs! Talked for about 20 mins saja tadi.. :) I just cant help myself if sehari nda dengar suara my sayang..hehe. Miss her so much.. Lunch d Jaya Hypermart tadi wif Nasrul, Ridhwan n Syukri..as usual..arah the food court. Not bad..tapi nda abis makan..terlampau banyak wa the mee goreng. Sanak perut olehnya. :p Then..round-round around sana. Before kul 1..ke md semula..ada class. My small sis ada chicken pox today..cant get near her. Terjangkit krg. Me nda pernah kana chicken pox..thats why. Bida kali ah mun terjangkit! Im gona stop now. Last day msg-ing my sayang. Her phone line kena ambil balik oleh her cuz. He/she just came back from uk. :\ Cant wait for her to get a new phone line. Rindu kali ah if nada msg/miscall from her. *muahz* Love you so much Nurul Assyirah Nadirah! ;) 26 days..

I still need to do my geo report. So tired. Ngalih menaip.. Tadi pagi..went to Pantai Berakas. Banyak la other english and gp class ppl jua d sana. Our class..Azri, Daniel, Nida, Kok Ting, Hjh Adibah, Fatihah and me saja yang datang. We took lots of photo..and we did lots of thing tadi. Main air..then..buat sand castle all that. Hehe. It was fun! Batah dah nda buat cematu. Balik rumah around kul 12. Tangah, tua, busu ada datang tadi..makans ambuyat. Nda kena ampiti..sia2 pun. :( Then..patang...around 3.30..tolak dari rumah. Went to Stadium Polis d Gadong Police Headquarters. I was looking for my sayang tadi..batah mencari..hehe..and at last..ada jua akhirnya. I was only there for about 1 hr. Nda dapat lama-lama. Hmmm..nda liat my sayang tarik kalat tadi. Rugi! *muahz* Esok..nada class gp..so..esok saja buat essay eng lit. Hehe. Malas aku anie.. :p My sayang tidur kali udah nie.. I believe she must be tired after the sports day tadi. Cian. ;) K. I wanna continue doing my geo report. I need to draw some diagrams. Urrrgh! I hate drawing. I really really hate it. But then..terpaksa jua. Its 80% of my MPR. I mean..the report. Love you so much sayang! ;) *hugz* 25 days..

Watchin konsert af2 ryt now..sambil doin this blog thingy. Hmm jumpa my sayang tadi patang. Thanx sayang for the sushi and tart yang u buatkan. Nyamans..hehe. Sampai sanak perut me makan tadi ah.. :p I want some other gewd food next time. Blehkan yang..? :p Im so lucky to have u.. ;) Ms manja..my gp teacher last day ngajar tadi. Hmm borings ih. New teacher lagi nie.. :\ We took a class photo tadi..before our class ended. Esok..ke pantai berakas or nda ah..? My sayang esok ada sport day..i'll try to come yang. Nda janji..but i will try. :) My mum n dad ke empire..ada dinner..function. Phew~ I called up my sayang tadi. Talked for about 1hr+. K la. I dunno what to type anymore. Nada idea. *muahz* -syazwanassyirah- 24 days.. Love u sayang. ;)

Ellew~ I cant blog yesterday..pc rosak..again. Hmm today's so tiring. Bejalan saja. I miss my sayang ryt now.. But its okey..im gonna meet her tomorrow at SAS. ;) I slept late last nite..around 12. I was wacthin tv3..cali ceritanya. Before tidur..i read a novel.."Kisah Kasih". I'll read it again krg..after my work's all done. I still need to do my gp..comprehension.. Tadi..i woke up at 11.21am. I thought it was only around 9. Hehe. Then..mandi..makans..sembahyang jumaat. In the afternoon..antar my bro n sis tuition..my mum brought me to "Sweet & Savoury Cafe" at Mata-mata. Makan cendol durian. Hehe. Nyaman kali ah..bulih. :p Tomorrow ada presentation in geo class. I hope its gonna be fun. Hehe. K la. I'll stop blogging now. *muahz* Yang..i love u so much. Im so lucky to have u by my side.. *hugs* 23 days.. ;)

Its 12.19am. Baru siap translating the script..thank god. Nasib jua abis dah. Relax jua sikit.. Im feelin sleepy actually..but then i still got my geo work to do. Ngalih ih.. Oh yea..i cant blog kelmarin..pc d rumah ada prob. But now okey dah..tadi baru repair.. Tadi patang..ada AIR. Academic Interim Report. My parents met wif my teachers tadi. Everything was fine..except masa jumpa cikgu zamzam..talkative kan aku anie? I wudnt be talkative in her class if i really enjoyed her lesson. Borings kali ah. Baik lagi becakap..siuk cikit.. Hehe. :p Mr. Gilmore n Ms Manja..okey. No probs at all. Hehe. All positive comments. :) Happy kali ah..bulih. :p Jumpa my sayang again tadi. At SAS. Mcm biasa. I bought her a chocolate (patchi) d mall tadi tengah hari..lapas lunch. :)My sayang asked me to read a novel.. Kisah Kasih. I'll start reading it as soon as everything's settle down dah. *muahz* K la. I need to stop now. Its getting late and late. Kan tidurs lagi..or else..i wud fall asleep again in Mr. Gilmore's class. Hehe. Love you yang.. *hugs*

Kalat mata me dah..still got some work to do. Im tryin to finish my script (translating from english to malay). I really hate doing it but then.. Hmmm im gonna meet my sayang again tomorrow. Can't wait. I really miss her..miss her smile..miss seeing her cutie face..hehe. Everything. Jalan ke yayasan maybe..if confirm dah. :) I wish tomorrow's sunday. i wanna wake up late! I dun wanna go to school esok..boring wa.. *huargh* I feel sleepy everytime i think n talk bout school...class...history...geography...gp... :| Andai kau tahu isi hatiku~ Betapa ku sayang~ Sayang padamu~ Seluas-luas lautan~ Engkau umpama sebutir bintang yang ku puja~ Antara bintang yang berjuta kau bersinar~ Thats a lyric from a song called "Hanya Engkaulah Kekasihku" - Scoin. I dedicate it especially for my sayang... *hugs* K la..i wanna start doing my work. Gud nyt yang..i love u. ;)

Phew~ Just came back home. Tadi ambil my sis n bro from skool..then antar my other sis tuition. Ngalih ih.. Tadi patang tpon my sayang..Nurul Assyirah Nadhirah. We talked for about 1hr 30mins..kajaps ganya. Hmmm..class tadi was..boring as usual. Hehe. Lunch d Restoran Faize tadi..somewhere around Beribi/Mata-mata i think with Nasrul, Ridhwan and Shukri (our driver). Jgn mare.. :p *muahz* A kiss for my sayang. ;) Yang, i really really love u. I'll write again later. Kan mandi..ttable buku my small sis..buat hw... 19 days..

I miss my sayang sooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo much. Boring vanars nada credit arah hp anie.. Krg tah beli easi..or shud i ask my dad/mum to buy me one..? Hehe. Skali-skala...bukannya selalu... :p Im a bit tired...dari kul 3 tadi typin this thingy. I need to translate a tv programme from english to malay. Phew~ Stress berabis..need to refer dictionary and all that.. Krg malam bejalan kali. Thats what my dad said tadi tengah hari. I dunno whether jadi or nda.. But im not looking forward to go out bejalan krg.. Ngalih...and im not in the right mood. Yang..me rindu arah u la..i wanna hug u. Hehe. :p I hope my sayang stayback esok..i really miss her to the max! Yang..im all urs and ure all mine.. ;) I'll be loving you forever~ Deep inside my heart u'll leave me never~ Even if you took my heart and tore it apart~ i will love you still forever~ *muahz* *muahz* *muahz* *muahz* *muahz* *muahz*

Morning! Its so cold..raining here. Yang, jgn beujan di pantai ah..i dun want u to get sick. Hehe. As if she was reading my blog d sana.. :p Hmmm..only me and my grandma at home..my family n my maid jalan. I like being alone actually...sunyi...n i can do what i want. :) There's nothin much to write...awal lakat. I'll write again krg..patang..or at nyt maybe. 18days..

School tadi was booooring..especially class geography. We went to the video room watchin a video about earth. Kalat mata meliat..tetidur jua sekajap. I dun bother watching it..Hehe. Nasib jua my teacher nda nampak..mun nda..berceramah cia lagi.. :P Im so tired ryt now. My cuz's (kaka amal, fakhriah, khairul, mimit, c bul..) here at our house..watching af. Nda jua sunyi rumah.. Tadi patang..went to sas..jumpa my sayang. Balik kul 4.30.. :) I feel sleepy…kan tidurs. But then, I dun wanna miss watching af. I wonder sapa kuar malam nie..bob, farah, zahid, kaer, mas, linda, adam, nurul..? My sayang baru msg me…cian…alum ya dapat tempat untuk masak bbq. I wish I got one at home (used to have one..tapi bebuang udah). She's goin to Pantai Muara esok..ada party thingy.. Jgn begatal yang! Hehe. I knew she wont do that..i trust my sayang..so..no worries. ;) I dunno what to write bout tonite. Nada idea kan tulis apa… Phew~ I guess i'll stop now.. Hehe. Yang, i love u soooooooooooooo much. *muahz* 17 days..

Its 6.43pm. Ke tambing tadi dengani my aunt n nini bali lauk, sayur, ketam and all that. We talked bout something *hot* and *membari sasak* tadi on the way ke sana. I never thought something like this would happen to me n my family..never. Just becos of that bitch..my life..my family..were ruined. ("Lawan tetap lawan." This saying do exist in my life...) Hmm..sayang..i enjoyed every single moment i spent with you. I never regret being with you..but i would regret for not being with u. U're everything in my life and becos of u..i am keen to live even longer. You gave me everything u got..and i do appreciate it. I really really love u so much and my love to u will never ever end. I hope our relationship will stay like this till i closed my eyes.. ;) Ive got lots of work to do tonite. Arranging my GP file, doing my essays..and most importantly..tepon my sayang..Nurul Assyirah Nadhirah. ;) Rindu kali ah..bulih.. :p Thats all i guess for today...i'll write again some other time..maybe tomorrow. Love you so much sayang.. *muahz*

My first posting here.. Why am i doing this? I dunno...i just feel like sharing to all of u every special moment i went through wif my sayang..Nurul Assyirah Nadirah. *muahz* I went to the mall yesterday afternoon..kul 2..liat movie ngan my sayang n her fwens. King Arthur. Siok jua la..nda rugi meliat. Tapinya..ada orang atu..mcm c taie..membayarkan my ticket. Eee~ Gigit sayang karang.. :p Sayang...i love you sooooooooooooo much and i love you even more every single day. I promise i will be faithful to you..nda me begatal ngan bini-bini lain. You're the only one i want in my life.. ;) I'll update this again karang patang..kan makans..n after that..mandi...sembahyang jumaat. Love my sayang and baby naqilah to the max! *hugs*

I didnt have time to blog yesterday. Need to do my hw..banyak kali ah. Slept at 1 d malam. Furball bising..payah kan tidur. Hmm..im so tired ryt now. Just finished doing my review of "Mona Lisa Smile" for my gp class esok.. I only 'copy and paste' from the website. Hehe. Went to the pantai kelmarin..siuk jua la..but it would be more fun if my sayang ada jua wif me. Banyak my fwen betanya.. "Eh wan, mana gfmu?" "Nda ko membawa ia ka?" "Napa ko nda bawa gfmu?" *phew* Sangal jua menjawab sal balik-balik menjawab.. Tadi jumpa my sayang d sas. She looks so lovely with her hair. Never seen her mcm atu since i know her. Hehe. *muahz* My sayang cute! :p Exam nda lagi batah..baiktah sayang belajar.. Get good grades for me! :) Oh yeah..RAUUFAH (lurus kah...?)Uve been checkin and readin my blog huh? Hehe. :p Malu ku ih.. K. Need to check and timetable my book. Nyt nyt. Wo ai ni sayang. ;)

Hellew. *phew* I'm not sure yet..jalan atau nda ke pantai esok ah? I wish my sayang can go there wif me esok. But then.. :( Neways, its okey and i understand. Tadi lunch d mamih wif nasrul, shukri n zharif. Then, after school..jumpa my sayang d sas. Hujan tadi. My sayang looks sooooo cute tadi..hehe. Can't wait to meet her again this monday. Rindu me rah my sayang.. My hp is with sayang till monday. She's sleepin at raufah's house tonite. Ada bbq. Sal atu tah my hp is with her. Payah kan contact ia d sana and i cant sleep if nda dengar her voice.. Hehe. ;) Sayang..i love u sooo much.. Im gona buy the easi line for u yang if ada dah d dst. Payah wa if nada hp. I miss u! Im watchin af sambil doing this blog. Batah jua abis af anie eh..nda sabar kan tpon my sayang. Really miss her. Hmmm : K la. Im gona stop now. Love my sayang soooo much! ;)

Morning~ Its friday again. Baru abis mandikan furball (my hamster). Nda ya banyak beulah tadi.. Hehe. I havent mandi yet. Tadi betepon ngan my sayang.. Thanx for waking me up! :p Last nite too..we talked for about 3hr. Neways..krg petang ke season wif uncle selomi, zharif and ridhwan. Ive got a history essay due by tomorrow. Alum lagi bebuat tu ih. Need to do some research karang. I'll do it later..lapas mandi n makan. *muahz* Love you sayang.

Morning~ Its friday again. Baru abis mandikan furball (my hamster). Nda ya banyak beulah tadi.. Hehe. I havent mandi yet. Tadi betepon ngan my sayang.. Thanx for waking me up! :p Last nite too..we talked for about 3hr. Neways..krg petang ke season wif uncle selomi, zharif and ridhwan. Ive got a history essay due by tomorrow. Alum lagi bebuat tu ih. Need to do some research karang. I'll do it later..lapas mandi n makan. *muahz* Love you sayang.
Ive got no mood to blog for tonite. Im sorry yang.. :(

Hellew again~ Eeeee~ Sasak ku ih with this hamster. 3x dah tukar kotak. Im gonna buy a cage for him (the hamster) sometime this week. Sasak kali ah. Abis semua kotak kan digigitnya wa.. Btw..nama the other hamster..bukannya Stitch. Its Furball. We (me n my sayang) decided to change the name. Hehe. :p Jumpa my sayang tadi petang d sas. She n her fwen ordered food from McD. Thanx sayang sal "memajal" me untuk makan. Hehe. :p Jgn mare. *muahz* I really really love her so much. Every moment spent wif her is just so special. U make me sayang u more! Yang..we've been together for 41 days.. Hehe. ;) My sayang called me up tadi..minta dengani buat karangan. We talked for about 30 mins. I hope my sayang nda jadi jalan esok..i wanna call her at home tomorrow. Everything would be fine after dangar suaranya. Hehe. K la. I'll stop for tonite. Love you sayang. ;) *hugs*

Its monday again. *phew* Petang tadi jumpa my sayang. Ada audition for teacher's day tadi d sas. Dorang farah, fizah...etc (dun remember their name) ada nyanyi tadi. It was fun~ :) Tadi lunch d gadong properties. Arah foodzone wif nasrul n shukri. Hmmm im sleepy dah. Its already 12.32 am. Baru abis buat essay eng. lit. I'll stop now. Love you sayang.. ;) *muahz*

Im a bit tired today.. Hehe. Banyak bejalan. Ikut syukri tadi balik from md ke sgs.. Tadi lunch break..went to batu bersurat. Lunch arah restoran liyana. *phew* Thats the worst restaurant ive ever been! Membari menyasal datang ke sana ah. Its not worth it! So u people..better AVOID going there for some food.. Batah menunggu makanan siap and terpaksa tah d CANCEL since we (me, shukri..) ada class in around 15 mins. Ngalih saja menunggu.. Bought 2 hamster for my sayang tadi arah pet vision.. Hehe. Cute vanars. We named it.."stitch" (dark brown colour) and "fluffy" (light brown). Hehe. Im going to get one sometime.. :p Betepon ngan my sayang tadi.. Talked only for about less than 1hr. Cian..sakit perutnya. Hehe. Yang, me rindu arah u!! I know we've met tadi..but then..i still miss u. I wish we could be together 24/7. I wish.. ;) Im sure ramai orang d bandar ryt now..ada tanglung and a kind of perayaan. I wish i could be there..but then..my family liat af. My sayang liat tv kali nie ryt now..i wonder sapa kuar malam nie. Hopefully its MAS! Sasak ku meliat ia ah.. K la. I'll stop now. Kan liat af. *muahz* Love my sayang (Nurul Assyirah Nadirah) soooooooooooo much. *hugs* ;)

Woke up at 10 today..nada orang bangunkan. Usually, my mum yang malar bangunkan if akhir dah. Hehe. I ate nasi lemak, cucur pisang and pulut panggang tadi for breakfast. Kanyangs jua la..but then, before sembahyang jumaat, makan me lagi..hehe. My auntie n my cuz (fakhriah, abg hj yusri..) datang ke runah tadi petang. Nda jua sunyi rumah. Ceta-ceta..all that. Puas makans durian tadi..my nini beli 8 ikat. Hehe. *yummy* I really really love eating durian. Nyaman kali ah..bulih! Kanyangs ih..baru makan sate.. Before that..betepon ngan my sayang. Yang, me rindu vanars arah u. I cant wait for tomorrow..batah jua ih. I wish I could control time. I would make it go faster and faster until the time me jumpa my sayang. Then, I would make time go slower if jumpa my sayang. Hehe. I wish! Angan-angan aku ah.. :p Lately, ive got not much idea bout what to write. I guess that’s all for today. Love my sayang soooo much. ;)

Went to yayasan tadi petang..ke dst..carikan line easi untuk my sayang. But unfortunately, line easi abis dah for the moment. I need to wait till next week. Thats what orang dst cakap to me tadi.. Cant wait for saturday to come..ikut shukri balik lapas skulah. He's goin to send me to sgs.. Thanx shuk a.k.a driver. Hehe. Jgn mare.
